products.description: Unified work management platform for planning, tracking, and delivering team work. Helps teams—from marketing to product—coordinate tasks, timelines, and accountability to reduce status meetings. Delivers clarity, faster execution, and scalable collaboration.

AI-powered layer that automates routine work and surfaces context-aware suggestions. Helps teams reduce manual planning and speed decisions by summarizing work, predicting blockers, and suggesting next steps. Speeds delivery while preserving governance.

Virtual assistants inside Asana that draft tasks, summarize projects, and suggest actions. Helps individual contributors and managers get work done faster with on-demand drafting and insights. Reduces busywork and accelerates execution.

Drag-and-deploy tool for building and customizing AI workflows that automate team processes. Helps operations and IT teams create repeatable automations tailored to their templates and approvals. Shortens time-to-value and scales automation safely.

Prebuilt and customizable AI-driven workflows that automate common processes like campaign launches or product intakes. Helps teams standardize repeatable work, reduce handoffs, and cut cycle times. Enables rapid deployment with minimal setup.

Advanced Permissions Management add-on that controls access and roles across projects and portfolios. Helps IT and security teams enforce governance and reduce risk while allowing teams the flexibility to collaborate. Simplifies audits and compliance at scale.

Compliance Management add-on that provides audit trails, controls, and reporting for regulated environments. Helps legal, security, and public-sector teams meet regulatory requirements and streamline audits. Ensures data governance without blocking productivity.

Curated templates for common use cases—campaigns, product launches, onboarding, and more—that jumpstart projects. Helps teams adopt best practices quickly and reduces setup time for repeatable initiatives. Drives consistency and faster ramp-up across teams.

Enhanced Power BI and Tableau connectors that export Asana data into executive-ready dashboards. Helps analysts and leaders visualize progress, spot bottlenecks, and report outcomes without manual data pulls. Improves decision-making with cross-tool insights.

Extensive ecosystem of 300+ integrations (Slack, Google, Salesforce, Figma, etc.) to keep work connected across tools. Helps teams eliminate context-switching by syncing tasks, files, and notifications where work happens. Increases productivity and tool ROI.
